name: One's Lonesome, Two's Company
description:
"So what you're saying is, is that you yourself suck at making friends."  "I shoot her a death glare, but I admit that that’s 100% true."

Kotone Kaneko doesn't have any real friends who she can trust, and when her so called "friends" turn on her due to an unpaid debt, Kotone can do nothing but run.
Her life slowly turns 180 degrees though, when an underclassman with an unusual background unexpectedly saves her from her ordeal. The two begin to grow closer and Kotone's own feelings start to become a muddled mess, not knowing just what these new emotions are.  She finds herself running away, but this time to forget about these forbidden feelings towards her new friend. Despite constantly pushing the thoughts away, she finds herself time and time again drawn towards the cheerful ball of happiness.

Will Kotone stop being a coward and take the risk of losing her only friend? Or will she manage to successfully push down the rising emotions? Take a short read through "One's Lonesome, Two's Company" and join the delinquent's road to dealing with her new gay feelings!

Hello, Team ANPIM here! Back at it again for a Yuri Game Jam, with another cheesy yuri kinetic novel!

This time, we finished a week before the due date as opposed to our... tradition of starting a week before the deadline;;;;;;;;;; OLTC (I guess we can abbreviate it to 1, 2) is longer than our previous novels, and I hope it's improved somewhat from them! Once again, it was the artist's idea to partake in this year's jam and as always, she puts unnecessary stress on herself for doing these, especially cause she's literally doing everything now;;;;;; For the sake of yuri!!!

This is also the first time where our "MC"'s sprite is situated on the right side, hope you guys don't get confused!

We hope you enjoy this kinetic novel and be sure to check out our previous ones!
